hints.title: Entanglement Entropy from IG
hints.content:
3903: :label: def-bh-entanglement-ig
3904: 
3905: For a spatial region $A \subset \mathcal{X}$, the **entanglement entropy** between $A$ and its complement $A^c$ is:
3906: 
3907: $$
3908: S_{\text{ent}}(A) = \sum_{\substack{w_i \in A \\ w_j \in A^c}} w_{ij} \ln w_{ij}
3909: 
3910: $$
3911: 
3912: where $w_{ij}$ are IG edge weights.
3913: 
3914: For a black hole, taking $A = B_H$ (interior), this gives the black hole entropy:
3915: 
3916: $$
3917: S_{\text{ent}}(B_H) = S_{\text{BH}} = \frac{A_H}{4G_N}

3909:
